page.title: 11Amusing Oneself
page.content: As would be expected of the area the recreational facilities are almost all natural. Indeed apart from a Rifle Range there are no constructed facilit ies to be found. Gardening in this fertile area takes up a lot of spare time for many people growing vegetables fruit and flowers. Reading is another favourite pastime _ especially winter _ and the mobile lib rary calls at Cossick Cross. Radio and Television provide further entertain_ ment at home, augmented in some cases by video and hifi systems. Sewing,knitting and crocheting are other hobbies which are popular. Most of the residents take advantage of their surroundings and are keen walk_ ers and cyclists. However unless they are prepared to travel in search of facilities most of their entertainment must be found at home.
